ar: ءَامَنَ الرَّسُولُ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مِن رَّبِّهِ
en: The Messenger has believed in what was revealed to him from his Lord,
All of them have believed in Allah and His angels and His books

ar: لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِّن رُّسُلِهِ
en: [saying], "We make no distinction between any of His messengers."
And they say, "We hear and we obey.
[We seek] Your forgiveness, our Lord, and to You is the [final] destination."
